page.title: 19Tourists: Ipplepen Area.
page.content: During the summer many people visit the four settlements in this area.They come{from all parts of Britain}and there are many visitors from{abroad. The visitors{stay in}holiday cottages (we identified 4 in Ipplepen), small caravaning and camping sites, bed and breakfast accommodation, with friends and relatives or house exchanges. Torbryan and Ipplepen are favourite destinations of{evening bus excursions from Torbay. Both of these places have {popular hostelries,the Plough Ipplepen {and the Church House Inn, Torbryan, still much as when built in 1400 A.D. { Tourists have come from:}Canada, United States, Italy, Sweden, Holland, Venezuela, New Zealand, France, Spain, Sri Lanka, Australia, Germany, Cyprus, Switzerland, Thailand, Greece, Ireland and the Republic of South Africa. Some seek infomation about ancestors.
